name: Astral Plane (alifadil)
description:
Astral Plane 

A game made by a solo developer it took me months to finish the test version 

the game is about a person who died and find himself in the afterlife his goal is to collect the five platonic solids to reach the highest level of awareness , and developing to a new being just like in hindu culture when the person reach the moksha level ! 

i hope you liked the game idea and design 

support me if you can ! 

thank you !
